Header: Min. Premadasa comments on constitutional reforms at Hambantota event
Content: The presentation of equipment and financial aid to approximately 266 low-income families under a programme to develop sanitation facilities in the Hambantota District took place at the Nimbarama Temple under Minister of Housing and Construction Sajith Premadasa, where he commented on constitutional reforms Minister of Housing and Construction, Sajith Premadasa said: It is the Former Minister Wimal Weerawansa who is heading the defeated faction of the opposition, together with the former president Mahinda Rajapaksa. He addedL These two people are conspiring on how to sabotage the development of a new constitution.
